sourcesContent:
<template>
    <button :class="isGreen ? buttonGreen : buttonWhite">{{buttonName}}</button>
</template>
<script>
export default {
    data() {
        return {
            isGreen: flase,
            buttonName: "Nhập",
            buttonGreen: "button-green",
            buttonWhite: "button-white",
        }
    },
}
</script>
<style>
button {
    margin: 0;
    padding: 0 12px;
    height: 32px;
    min-width: 96px;
    border-radius: 4px;
    border-width: 0;
}

.button-green {
    background-color: var(--main);
    color: var(--button-white-background);
}

.button-green:hover {
    background-color: var(--main-hover);
    cursor: pointer;
}

.button-green-disable {
    background-color: var(--button-grey-background);
    color: var(--button-grey-text);
    cursor: not-allowed;
}

.button-white {
    background-color: var(--button-white-background);
    color: var(--button-black-text);
    border: 1px solid;
    border-color: var(--button-border);
}

.button-white:hover {
    background-color: var(--background);
    cursor: pointer;
}

.button-white--disable {
    background-color: var(--button-white-background);
    color: var(--button-grey-text);
    cursor: not-allowed;
}
</style>
